meanings.definition: Unwilling to give or spend money; miserly
meanings.sent1: He is the stingiest person I know, always saving every penny.
meanings.sent2: The stingiest man in town never donates to charity.
meanings.sent3: The stingiest millionaire in the city refused to buy a new car.
meanings.sent4: Her stingiest friend held onto old clothes like they were gold.
meanings.sent5: The stingiest boss never approved any employee bonuses.

meanings.definition: Extremely tight or constricted in size or amount
meanings.sent1: The stingiest jar was barely filled with coins.
meanings.sent2: The stingiest knot was impossible to untangle.
meanings.sent3: The stingiest backpack could barely fit a sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The stingiest budget left no room for unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent5: The stingiest box held only a few tiny treasures.
